epic.title: Messaging and Communication
epic.description: Implement core text messaging and video calling features to enable real-time communication between users, including both one-to-one and group interactions.

stories.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
stories.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups with status indicators and chronological display.
acceptanceCriteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Sent, delivered, and read status indicators are displayed correctly for each message
Messages are displayed in chronological order for all conversation types
Supports group chats with up to 50 participants

tasks.title: Implement backend messaging service
tasks.description: Develop real-time messaging server to handle instant message delivery and status updates.

tasks.title: Create frontend messaging UI
tasks.description: Build the chat interface with conversation view, input box, and status indicators.

tasks.title: Integrate real-time messaging protocol
tasks.description: Use WebSockets or a similar protocol to send and receive messages with low latency.

tasks.title: Implement group messaging
tasks.description: Allow creation and management of group chats with up to 50 participants.

tasks.title: Add message ordering logic
tasks.description: Ensure messages are sorted chronologically across different clients.

stories.title: Video Calling Feature
stories.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real-time with high-quality video and audio.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contact list
Video and audio quality remain stable at or above 720p resolution under standard broadband conditions
Supports group video calls with up to 10 participants
Call connection time is under 3 seconds

tasks.title: Develop media streaming backend
tasks.description: Set up a media server to stream audio and video for calls.

tasks.title: Integrate WebRTC for video calling
tasks.description: Implement real-time media transmission using WebRTC framework.

tasks.title: Create video call UI
tasks.description: Design and build the user interface for call initiation, participation, and controls.

tasks.title: Implement call signaling
tasks.description: Set up real-time signaling service to manage call setup and teardown.

tasks.title: Add group video call support
tasks.description: Implement functionality to host and join group calls with up to 10 participants.

tasks.title: Ensure encryption for calls
tasks.description: Implement end-to-end encryption for both video and audio streams.
